GSD.product_version: versions from v4.8 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
ASoC: mediatek: mt8173-rt5650-rt5514: fix refcount leak in mt8173_rt5650_rt5514_dev_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 812a18e48efb239c4417541ca25707c8888fdd11, it was introduced in version v4.8 by commit 0d1d7a664288f9c1b6f79c971d528a354315e9d3. For more details please see the references link.
